scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook-backend/
scripts.deploy: cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-backend/ heroku master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd ../../ && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && cd part3/phonebook-backend && npm run deploy
